title: Flex Queue seems stupid
body: Teams are always unbalanced i dont know if solo Q rank has anything to do with flex but alot of games diamonds are being matched against silvers and its just a stomp for whoever has the majorly unbalanced team doesn't really seem like a competitive mode when the teams are soooo unbalanced that half the games are over before they begin.

replies.body:
These are known issues and being worked on. Any updates will be posted here:

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/u2iR6nTU-ranked-flex-match-making-issues-update
